dcterms:creator: L. Lugosch
M. Ravanelli
P. Ignoto
V. S. Tomar
Y. Bengio
dcterms:description: The Fluent Speech Commands dataset is used to evaluate the proposed end-to-end spoken language understanding system, which classifies speech signals directly to structured data without prior transcription to text.
dcterms:title: Fluent Speech Commands dataset
